meaningMnemonic: When the <radical>tsunami</radical> struck, it hit your <radical>tent</radical> full of <radical>beans</radical>. When you lost your tent of beans, you had a moment of <kanji>lucidity</kanji>. You don't need so much stuff, you can live without it!
readingMnemonic: Your <kanji>lucidity</kanji> is clear to everyone because you wear a <reading>su</reading>it (す). Everyone knows that lucid people wear suits!
